info.title: Solscan Pro API V2
info.description: This API provides access to Solana blockchain data, including account transfers and DeFi activities. It offers various filtering options for precise data retrieval.

get.description: Get the details of an account

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: A wallet address on solana blockchain

lamports.description: The number of lamports assigned to this account

executable.description: Boolean indicating if the account contains a program

owner_program.description: The address of the program this account has been assigned to

rent_epoch.description: The epoch at which this account will next owe rent

is_oncurve.description: Boolean indicating if the account is on curve or not

get.description: Get transfer data of an account

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Solana wallet address

parameters.name: activity_type
parameters.description: Type of transfer

parameters.name: token_account
parameters.description: Filter transfers for a specific token account in the wallet

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Filter transfer data with direction is from an address

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Filter transfers from a specific address

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: Filter by token address. For native SOL transfers, use So11111111111111111111111111111111111111111

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: Filter by amount range for a specific token. Example: ?amount[]=1&amount[]=2&token=So11111111111111111111111111111111111111112

parameters.name: from_time
parameters.description: Filter by time range (Unix timestamp in seconds). Example: ?from_time=1720153259&to_time=1720153276

parameters.name: to_time
parameters.description: Filter by time range (Unix timestamp in seconds). Example: ?from_time=1720153259&to_time=1720153276

parameters.name: exclude_amount_zero
parameters.description: Exclude transfers with zero amount

parameters.name: flow
parameters.description: Filter by transfer direction: in or out

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Number of items per page

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: The parameter allows you to specify the field by which the returned list will be sorted

parameters.name: sort_order
parameters.description: The parameter allows you to specify the sort order

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Filter by value range (dollar). Example: ?value[]=1&value[]=10

parameters.name: block_time
parameters.description: Filter by block time range (Unix timestamp in seconds). Example: ?block_time[]=1720153259&block_time[]=1720153276

amount.description: Transfer amount (divide by 10^token_decimals for actual amount)

get.description: Get defi activities involving an account

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: A Wallet address on solana blockchain

parameters.name: activity_type
parameters.description: Type of activity data

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Filter activities from an address

parameters.name: platform
parameters.description: Filter by list platform addresses. Maximum 5 addresses

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: Filter by list source addresses. Maximum 5 addresses

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: Filter activities data by token address

parameters.name: from_time
parameters.description: Filter by time range (Unix timestamp in seconds). Example: ?from_time=1720153259&to_time=1720153276

parameters.name: to_time
parameters.description: Filter by time range (Unix timestamp in seconds). Example: ?from_time=1720153259&to_time=1720153276

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Number items per page

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: The parameter allows you to specify the field by which the returned list will be sorted

parameters.name: sort_order
parameters.description: The parameter allows you to specify the sort order

parameters.name: block_time
parameters.description: Used when you want to filter data by block time. Format time: UnixTime in seconds. You need to pass array into http query to filter by start and stop block_time. Example: ?block_time[]=1720153259&block_time[]=1720153276

trans_id.description: Transaction Hash or Signature for activity

get.description: Get balance change activities involving an account

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: A Wallet address on solana blockchain

parameters.name: token_account
parameters.description: A token account of wallet on solana blockchain

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: Filter activities data by token address

parameters.name: from_time
parameters.description: Filter by time range (Unix timestamp in seconds). Example: ?from_time=1720153259&to_time=1720153276

parameters.name: to_time
parameters.description: Filter by time range (Unix timestamp in seconds). Example: ?from_time=1720153259&to_time=1720153276

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Number items per page

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination

parameters.name: remove_spam
parameters.description: The query parameter to determine if spam activities have been removed or not

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: Filter by amount range for a specific token. Example: ?amount[]=1&amount[]=2&token=So11111111111111111111111111111111111111112

parameters.name: flow
parameters.description: Filter by change direction: in or out

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: The parameter allows you to specify the field by which the returned list will be sorted

parameters.name: sort_order
parameters.description: The parameter allows you to specify the sort order

parameters.name: block_time
parameters.description: Used when you want to filter data by block time. Format time: UnixTime in seconds. You need to pass array into http query to filter by start and stop block_time. Example: ?block_time[]=1720153259&block_time[]=1720153276

trans_id.description: Transaction hash or signature for activity

address.description: The wallet involved in the activity

token_address.description: The address of token involved in the activity

token_decimals.description: The decimals of token involved in the activity

token_account.description: The address of the token account involved in the activity

pre_balance.description: The account balance before executing the transaction

post_balance.description: The account balance after executing the transaction

change_type.description: The type of account balance change: increase (inc) or decrease (dec)

get.description: Get the list of transactions of an account

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: A wallet address on solana blockchain

parameters.name: before
parameters.description: The signature of the latest transaction of previous page

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of transactions should be returned

status.description: The status of the transaction: Success or Fail

program_ids.description: The list of addresses of programs involved in the transaction

get.description: Get the portfolio for a given address

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: A wallet address on solana blockchain

total_value.description: The total value of all tokens in USD

balance.description: The token balance. Calculated by formula: balance = amount / (10 ^ decimals)
The token balance. Calculated by formula: balance = amount / (10 ^ decimals)

get.description: Get token accounts of an account

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: A Wallet address on solana blockchain

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of token

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of items per page

parameters.name: hide_zero
parameters.description: Filter tokens that have amount is zero

get.description: Get the list of stake accounts of an account

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: A wallet address on solana blockchain

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of items per page

role.description: The roles of the stake account

status.description: The status of the stake account

type.description: The type of the stake account

voter.description: The address of the vote account

sol_balance.description: The SOL balance of the stake account

total_reward.description: The total reward of the stake account

stake_account.description: The address of the stake account

get.description: Export the rewards for an account. Maximum items: 5000. Without time filter, data will be return for 1 month staking reward.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: A wallet address on solana blockchain

parameters.name: time_from
parameters.description: The start time for the export. Format: Unix time in seconds. Default 1 month before time_to

parameters.name: time_to
parameters.description: The end time for the export. Format: Unix time in seconds. Default current time.

get.description: Export transfer data of an account

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Solana wallet address

parameters.name: activity_type
parameters.description: Type of transfer

parameters.name: token_account
parameters.description: Filter transfers for a specific token account in the wallet

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Filter transfer data with direction is from an address

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Filter transfers from a specific address

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: Filter by token address. For native SOL transfers, use So11111111111111111111111111111111111111111

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: Filter by amount range for a specific token. Example: ?amount[]=1&amount[]=2&token=So11111111111111111111111111111111111111112

parameters.name: from_time
parameters.description: Filter by time range (Unix timestamp in seconds). Example: ?from_time=1720153259&to_time=1720153276

parameters.name: to_time
parameters.description: Filter by time range (Unix timestamp in seconds). Example: ?from_time=1720153259&to_time=1720153276

parameters.name: exclude_amount_zero
parameters.description: Exclude transfers with zero amount

parameters.name: flow
parameters.description: Filter by transfer direction: in or out

parameters.name: block_time
parameters.description: Used when you want to filter data by block time. Format time: UnixTime in seconds. You need to pass array into http query to filter by start and stop block_time. Example: ?block_time[]=1720153259&block_time[]=1720153276

get.description: Get transfer data of a token

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: A token address on solana blockchain

parameters.name: activity_type
parameters.description: Type of transfer data

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Filter transfer data with direction is from an address

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Filter transfer data with direction is to an address

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: Filter transfer data by by amount. But you need to pass token address first because amount filter will be belong to one token address. Ex: Filter amount from 1 to 2 SOL ?amount[]=1&amont[]=2&token=So11111111111111111111111111111111111111112

parameters.name: block_time
parameters.description: Used when you want to filter data by block time. Format time: UnixTime in seconds. You need to pass array into http query to filter by start and stop block_time. Example: ?block_time[]=1720153259&block_time[]=1720153276

parameters.name: exclude_amount_zero
parameters.description: Exculde transfer that has amount is zero

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Number items per page

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: The parameter allows you to specify the field by which the returned list will be sorted

parameters.name: sort_order
parameters.description: The parameter allows you to specify the sort order

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Filter by value range (dollar). Example: ?value[]=1&value[]=10

trans_id.description: Transaction Hash or Signature for activity

token_address.description: The address of the token transferring

amount.description: Transfer amount. You need to divide token_decimals to get real amount.

parameters.name: from_time

get.description: Get token markets

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: Token pair address

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: The parameter allows you to specify the field by which the returned list will be sorted

parameters.name: program
parameters.description: Filter by list program addresses. Maximum 5 addresses

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Number items per page

get.description: Get the metadata of a token

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: A token address on solana blockchain

price.description: The price of this token in USD

volume_24h.description: The token's trading volume in USD over the last 24 hours

market_cap.description: The market capitalization of this token

market_cap_rank.description: The market capitalization rank of this token

price_change_24h.description: The price change of this token in the last 24 hours

holder.description: The total number of the holders of this token

create_tx.description: The transaction that token was created

created_time.description: The Unix epoch time that token was created

first_mint_tx.description: The transaction that token was minted first time

first_mint_time.description: The Unix epoch time that token was minted first time

mint_authority.description: The mint authority of the token

freeze_authority.description: The freeze authority of the token

metadata.name: Jupiter
metadata.description: JUP is the official governance token for Jupiter.

get.description: Get price of a token

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: A token address on solana blockchain

parameters.name: from_time
parameters.description: Used when you want to filter data by time. Format time: YYYYMMDD. You need to pass array into http query to filter by start and end time. Example: ?from_time=20240701&to_time=20240715

parameters.name: to_time
parameters.description: Used when you want to filter data by time. Format time: YYYYMMDD. You need to pass array into http query to filter by start and end time. Example: ?from_time=20240701&to_time=20240715

parameters.name: time
parameters.description: Used when you want to filter data by time. Format time: YYYYMMDD. You need to pass array into http query to filter by start and end time. Example: ?time[]=20240701&time[]=20240715

get.description: Get the list of token holders

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: A token address on solana blockchain

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Number items per page

parameters.name: from_amount
parameters.description: Filter holders by minimum token holding amount. The number should be in string format

parameters.name: to_amount
parameters.description: Filter holders by maximum token holding amount. The number should be in string format

total.description: The total number of holders of this token

address.description: The address of the token account holding the token

owner.description: The address of the owner holding the token

rank.description: The rank of the holder, sorted from the largest

get.description: Get the list of tokens

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: The parameter allows you to specify the field by which the returned list of tokens will be sorted

parameters.name: sort_order
parameters.description: The parameter allows you to specify the sort order

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Number items per page

price_24h_change.description: The number shows the percentage change in token price over the last 24 hours

holder.description: The number of holders of the token

created_time.description: The Unix epoch time that token was created

errors.message: Validation Error: "sort_order" must be one of [asc, desc]

get.description: Get the list of top tokens

price_24h_change.description: The number shows the percentage change in token price over the last 24 hours

holder.description: The number of holders of the token

created_time.description: The Unix epoch time that token was created

get.description: Get the list of trending tokens

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number items should be returned

errors.message: Validation Error: "limit" must be greater than or equal to 1

get.description: Get the list of new NFTs

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Filter ('created_time')

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Number items per page

meta.name: Time Travelling Benji #51
meta.description: 1137 Benjis are noble travelers of both time and space on a quest to seek the  Everything Answer , the ultimate truth that underpinned the cosmos.

get.description: Get NFT activities

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: From

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: To

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: Filter by list source addresses. Maximum 5 addresses

parameters.name: activity_type
parameters.description: Type of defiactivity data

parameters.name: from_time
parameters.description: Filter by time range (Unix timestamp in seconds). Example: ?from_time=1720153259&to_time=1720153276

parameters.name: to_time
parameters.description: Filter by time range (Unix timestamp in seconds). Example: ?from_time=1720153259&to_time=1720153276

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: Filter activities data by token address

parameters.name: collection
parameters.description: collection

parameters.name: currency_token
parameters.description: currency_token

parameters.name: price
parameters.description: Filter transfer data by by amount. But you need to pass token address in field currency_token first because price filter will be belong to one currency token address. Ex: Filter price from 1 to 2 SOL ?price[]=1&price[]=2&currency_token=So11111111111111111111111111111111111111112

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Number items per page

parameters.name: block_time
parameters.description: Used when you want to filter data by block time. Format time: UnixTime in seconds. You need to pass array into http query to filter by start and stop block_time. Example: ?block_time[]=1720153259&block_time[]=1720153276

trans_id.description: Transaction Hash or Signature for activity

parameters.name: range
parameters.description: Days range

parameters.name: sort_order
parameters.description: The parameter allows you to specify the sort order

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: The parameter allows you to specify the field by which the returned list will be sorted

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Number items per page

parameters.name: collection
parameters.description: Collection ID, if not provided, will return all collections

parameters.description: Number items per page

meta.name: SMB #2960
meta.description: SMB is a collection of 5000 randomly generated 24x24 pixels NFTs on the Solana Blockchain. Each SolanaMonkey is unique and comes with different type and attributes varying in rarity.

get.description: Get the list of the latest transactions

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of transactions should be returned

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: The filter parameter for excluding vote transactions

status.description: The status of the transaction: Success or Fail

block_time.description: The Unix time of the slot

program_ids.description: The list of addresses of programs involved in the transaction

errors.message: Validation Error: tx is not allowed

get.description: Get the detail of a transaction. Return transaction data after parsed by Solscan Parser. Data will include very helpful data such as: token and sol balance changes, IDL data, defi or transfer activities of each instructions

parameters.name: tx
parameters.description: Transaction Address

sol_bal_change.description: List Navtive Sol balance changes for accounts in this transaction

token_bal_change.description: List SPL Token balance changes for accounts in this transaction

programs_involved.description: List of program addresses participating in the transaction

parsed_instructions.description: List of instructions and inner instructions

signer.description: List of signers in this transaction

status.description: Status of transaction, 1 for success and 0 for error

compute_units_consumed.description: Number of compute units consumed by the transaction

address_table_lookup.description: Transaction addresses loaded from address lookup tables

log_message.description: array of string log messages or null if log message recording was not enabled during this transaction

log_message: Program log: Initialize the associated token account
Program log: Please upgrade to SPL Token 2022 for immutable owner support

get.description: Get the actions of a transaction. Return the actions like: transfers, swap activities, nft activities...

parameters.name: tx
parameters.description: Transaction Address

activities.description: List Defi and NFT activities on transaction

get.description: Get the list of the latest blocks

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of blocks should be returned

fee_rewards.description: The total fee rewards for this block

transactions_count.description: The number of transactions of this block

current_slot.description: The current slot index of this block

block_height.description: The number of blocks beneath this block

block_time.description: The Unix time of this block

parent_slot.description: The slot index of this block's parent

previous_block_hash.description: The blockhash of this block's parent

errors.message: Validation Error: block is not allowed

get.description: Get the list of transactions of a block

parameters.name: block
parameters.description: The slot index of a block

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Number of items per page

parameters.name: exclude_vote
parameters.description: Excludes vote transactions from the results

parameters.name: program
parameters.description: The program used to filter transactions that interact with it

total.description: The total number of transactions in this block

status.description: The status of the transaction: Success or Fail

block_time.description: The Unix time of the slot

program_ids.description: The list of addresses of programs involved in the transaction

errors.message: Validation Error: block must be a number

get.description: Get the used Compute Units of a subscriber

renew_date.description: The time when the user renewed the subscription

end_date.description: The time when the subscription ends

total_requests_24h.description: The total of requests over the last 24h

success_rate_24h.description: The rate of successful requests over the last 24h

total_cu_24h.description: The total of CU usage over the last 24h
